medium: Soft-paste procelain with enamel and gilded decoration
title: Tea Cup
description: tea cup and saucer, ceramic-porcelain, French XVIIIc (82.109.14.1 and .2) called \'coffee cup and saucer\' on cat. cards; dims h of cup 2-1/2\' diam of saucer 4-3/4\' Straight-sided cup with scroll handle, saucer with sloping sides. White ground with tiny sprigs of polychrome flowers and a border of continuous triangles reserved in lilac with miniature sprigs. In center of cup letter \'I\' composed of floral sprigs and enclosed within a rose circlet.
creditline: Gift of Michele Beiny in memory of her grandfather Hanns Weinberg
